    HIV.E.DE42Already on ART at first antenatal care visitTiming of ART initiation - Already on ART at first antenatal care visit
    HIV.E.DE43Newly on ART during pregnancyTiming of ART initiation - Newly on ART during pregnancy
    HIV.E.DE44Newly on ART during labour and deliveryTiming of ART initiation - Newly on ART during labour and delivery
